name: Fvwm-xdg-menu
tagline: xdg application menu with full support for the additional categories for fvwm and other xdg compliant desktops
body:
### Welcome to Fvwm-xdg-menu
Fvwm-Xdg-menu is a xdg application menu with full support for the additional categories. It is designed with fvwm in mind but should work with any xdg compliant desktop.

Well almost, it doesn't work with kde. Please don't fill a bug report here, but complain to the kde team instead. Their menu implementation doesn't support fully the additional categories, is not compatible with a compliant menu like this one, and that's definitely not my problem.

### Download the last release
To come soon

### Authors and Contributors
Dominique Michel (@domichel) started this project in 2014, he has been the main contributor until now.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with fvwm-xdg-menu? Check out the documentation at https://github.com/domichel/fvwm-xdg-menu or fill a ticket at https://github.com/domichel/fvwm-xdg-menu/issues and I will help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
